name: Haste-Miner 2
description:
Haste-miner 2 is a sequel to the widely popular title "Haste-miner" developed by Seyloj.

In this game, your main objective is to mine.
When mining you earn money as well as tokens which are used to upgrade your pickaxe as well as travel to new mines. The game has lots of content and a very relaxing soundtrack.

Spirit system
Spirits are unlockable boost that will enhance some aspects of the game while (sometimes) nerfing some aspects of it, most spirits can be levelled up for even better effects and are permanent, meaning they do not reset when rebirthing and carry over planets. The game currently has 25 different spirits ranging in rarity.
(You can only have 1 spirit equipped at a time.)

Rebirth system
The game features a rebirth system where you can reset your progress for a permanent income boost and "rebirth points" which are used to buy powerful permanent upgrades.

Planet system
The game also has a planet system which allows you to unlock and mine different planets with different types of ores and visuals. Currently, the game has 5 different planets.

Dungeons
On top of mining in a large procedurally generated rectangle mine, you can also mine in "the dungeon" where ores will give much better rewards and can give you a variety of items. Be careful though, as falling into any of the "pits" in the dungeon will make you lose everything you mined there.

Save sharing system
If you want to keep playing on a different device, you can easily do so with the save sharing system, simply go to earth and generate a "Save string" at the save sharing machine, send that save string to your other device and paste it into the save sharing machine on that device.

Inventory system
Haste-Miner 2 has a full inventory system with lots of different items, use "Tab" in game to toggle your inventory

Other
On top of the features listed above, there are also some small features like: Crate system (NOT microtransactions), pickaxe skins, offline generators, stats, "Blockopedia".
